name: INAddMediaMediaDestinationResolutionResult
desc: A resolution result for the types of destinations when adding media.

items.name: init(mediaDestinationResolutionResult: INMediaDestinationResolutionResult)
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution involves successfully adding a media item to a particular destination.

items.name: class func unsupported(forReason: INAddMediaMediaDestinationUnsupportedReason) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an object whose resolution requires the user to confirm the media destination.

items.name: enum INAddMediaMediaDestinationUnsupportedReason
items.desc: Reasons describing why the destination is not supported.
